title: Bug 109718: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTER THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: tips show in given format
Actual Result: tips show in one line
OB: The tips in the text item are being displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips in the text item should be displayed in the given format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Save some large content in a text item
2. Put the mouse on the text item
3. Observe that the tips are displayed in one line
